name: Flying Police Bike Simulator
description:
Flying Police Bike Simulator

Flying Police Bike Simulator is a fun and exciting open world police motorbike driving bike simulator where you, the best police bike officer, control a super fast police bike.

Become a talented police officer bike driver in Police Bike stunt Simulator where you can go really fast with nitro so the bike can go to extreme fast speeds and zoom through the city streets area, doing crazy amazing stunts with bike on huge stunt ramps and making the city safe from crime with stunt on bike.

 You take the role of the police motorbike officer and you must go through each best level, ridding the city of crime by collecting stolen items like cash bags, drugs, sports cars, trucks, and gold bars by driving through bike in the city and searching for all of these stolen items.

 With the open world best city environment simulation like Police Bike stunt Simulator, you can drive the police bike onto stunt ramps to perform exciting, amazing stunts and build up incredible speeds with nitro boosts. If you like to go to extreme fast speeds and becoming the best police motorbike officer in the city, fighting crime and serving justice to people, then you will fall in with love Police Bike stunt Simulator!

Key Features :

 => Easy to learn Bike controls, both touch and tilt controls  
=> Realistic police motorbike physics 
=> Massive real life city map environments with traffic
 => Nitrous/Nitro Button for extra bike speed 
=> Real world environments with city area 
=> Addictive Item collection in game
